about_the_game:
In the world of Meda, you play as a young Traveller. You will have the freedom to explore this vast and beautiful world at your own pace. There will be no predetermined path for you to follow; you will forge your own path through the world, discovering its secrets and encountering its many inhabitants as you go. Whether you choose to engage in combat or avoid it altogether, delve into the game's deep crafting system or simply enjoy the scenery, the choice will be yours. Your journey will be defined by the decisions you make and the experiences you have along the way, making each playthrough a unique and personal adventure.

The world of Meda is a strange and beautiful place, filled with diverse regions that range from shimmering snowy mountains to luscious evergreen forests. As you explore the world, you'll encounter spirits, animals, and people, as well as weapons and armor to equip, potions and plants to brew, and countless quests and stories to experience. And all of this takes place within a vast and immersive pixel art world that we hope will capture your imagination and take you on a journey you'll never forget.

content_descriptors.notes: Spirit of Meda incorporates tasteful, fantastical violence suitable for adventure game enthusiasts.
